fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • In later editions of Thursday’s paper, an article incorrectly referred to “the Mail’s former owner, News Group Newspapers” (Labour to cut off donations from Mosley over links to ‘racist’ pamphlet, 1 March, page 12). News Group Newspapers was the former owner of the now defunct News of the World, not of the Daily Mail. The error was introduced during the editing process. • Other recently corrected articles include: Why The Shape of Water should win the 2018 best picture Oscar I’m going to keep giving to Oxfam, and so should you Thursday briefing: Trump ambushes Republicans and NRA on gun safety
